title: MKL Error when import torch after installing 0.3.0 on CentOS
body_html:
After installing from the website by:
conda install pytorch torchvision -c pytorch
it gets the following error when I'm trying to import torch:

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "", line 1, in
File "/XXXX/anaconda2/envs/XXX/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/init.py", line 56, in
from torch._C import *
ImportError: /cm/shared/apps/parallel_studio_xe_2015_update2/composer_xe_2015.2.164/mkl/lib/intel64/libmkl_gf_lp64.so: undefined symbol: mkl_lapack_sgelqf

When I rollback to 0.2.0, the error is gone.

  • OS:
Distributor ID: CentOS
Description:    CentOS release 6.7 (Final)
Release:        6.7
Codename:       Final
  • PyTorch version:0.3.0-py36_cuda8.0.61_cudnn7.0.3h37a80b5_4
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source):
    conda install pytorch torchvision -c pytorch
  • Python version:Python 3.6.4 :: Anaconda, Inc.
  • CUDA/cuDNN version:Cuda compilation tools, release 8.0, V8.0.61

body:
After installing from the website by:
`conda install pytorch torchvision -c pytorch`
it gets the following error when I'm trying to `import torch`:
> Traceback (most recent call last):
>   File "<string>", line 1, in <module>
>   File "/XXXX/anaconda2/envs/XXX/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 56, in <module>
>     from torch._C import *
> ImportError: /cm/shared/apps/parallel_studio_xe_2015_update2/composer_xe_2015.2.164/mkl/lib/intel64/libmkl_gf_lp64.so: undefined symbol: mkl_lapack_sgelqf

When I rollback to 0.2.0, the error is gone.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
- OS:

```
Distributor ID: CentOS
Description:    CentOS release 6.7 (Final)
Release:        6.7
Codename:       Final
```

- PyTorch version:`0.3.0-py36_cuda8.0.61_cudnn7.0.3h37a80b5_4`
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source):
`conda install pytorch torchvision -c pytorch`
- Python version:`Python 3.6.4 :: Anaconda, Inc.`
- CUDA/cuDNN version:`Cuda compilation tools, release 8.0, V8.0.61`
